dao

Class ExpenseDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.DAO
      • dao.ExpenseDAO

  • public class ExpenseDAO
extends DAO
    Expense Data Access Object Class. Manipulates the Expense table in the data base.
    Author:
    Aran

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExpenseDAO()
      Gets the details regarding the systems MySql database.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void generateExpenseID()
      Gets an identifier value that this class will use to label new expenses.
      ExpenseRetrievalResponse getAllExpensesByEmail(java.lang.String email)
      Retrieves expenses from the database based on the email provided, this class also gets the expense descriptions and image data from the file system.
      int getId()
      Gets the most recently used ID in the expense table.
      ExpenseSubmissionResponse insertExpense(Expense expense)
      Used to write expense information into the expense table of the database.
      CancelExpenseResponse removeExpense(int expenseID)
      Remove an expense based on the ID provided from the expense table in the MySQL database.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExpenseDAO

        public ExpenseDAO()
        Gets the details regarding the systems MySql database.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public int getId()
        Gets the most recently used ID in the expense table.
        Returns:
        the latest integer unique identifier.

      • generateExpenseID

        public void generateExpenseID()
        Gets an identifier value that this class will use to label new expenses. Required in case there are already expenses in the database, upon deployment we don't want to over write any pre-existing Expenses.

      • insertExpense

        public ExpenseSubmissionResponse insertExpense(Expense expense)
        Used to write expense information into the expense table of the database.
        Parameters:
        expense -
        Returns:
        ExpenseSubmissionResponse object which specifying the status of the expense submission, and any exceptions thrown in the process of submitting an expense.

      • getAllExpensesByEmail

        public ExpenseRetrievalResponse getAllExpensesByEmail(java.lang.String email)
        Retrieves expenses from the database based on the email provided, this class also gets the expense descriptions and image data from the file system.
        Parameters:
        email -
        Returns:
        ExpenseRetrievalResponse containing the status of the request, if successful this object will contain all the expenses corresponding to the email. If any exceptions were thrown during when getting the user's expenses, they will be found the in the response.

      • removeExpense

        public CancelExpenseResponse removeExpense(int expenseID)
        Remove an expense based on the ID provided from the expense table in the MySQL database.
        Parameters:
        expenseID -
        Returns:
        CancelExpenseResponse containing the status of the request, as well as exceptions thrown during this process.
